thread.title: Yankees clinch playoff spot after 2-year absence, top Boston
thread.title_full: Yankees clinch playoff spot after 2-year absence, top Boston

title: Yankees clinch playoff spot after 2-year absence, top Boston
text:
> Top News Yankees clinch playoff spot after 2-year absence, top Boston Boston Red Sox catcher Sandy Leon,left, joins Boston Red Sox relief pitcher Jean Machi on the mound after Machi allowed a seventh-inning, solo home run to New York Yankees Greg Bird in a baseball game in New York, Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
